title: Will Riot Please Do Something About The Tanks.
body: Is riot ever gonna do anything about this? Had a game against a taric, sejuani and mundo. They all built full tank items but did so much damage. Sejuani's combo could erase our adc literally (our adc tried to 1 v 1 her). Later on ahri 1 v 1'ed taric ( ahri won because of team help later on) and she barely survived. Mundo is no question really annoying. He has so much damage on his E and can basically just ULT to full health.

replies.body:
For Mundo use Ignite and grevious wounds items?
and rhe last whisper upgrade
I was jungler so I did not take ignite lol.

For the tanks you just need to do what's always been required to take them down: cc them and shred their armor/mr to take them down. If you see a lot of hp building tanks, get yourself a bork over bt & get dominks regards. Also, if you don't have a tank line, don't 5v5 - look for picks. For Mundo/Vlad/Trundle/Illaoi and any other massively healing tanks, ignite, morellos & mortal reminder are the way to go, plus cc. You gotta have the cc.
but then they start grouping and we are forced to defend. Since they are so tanky they just dive us and deal so much fking damage

cc dude. you can lock them down under tower and force them to take tower dmg + your dmg. if you haven't got that, then you should be bringing disengage tools - things like poppy ult, liss ult, janna ult, nami ult, etc etc.
Yeah true but still tanks needs some nerfing. Malphite can build full tank and can erase your adc off the map.

Welcome to World of Tan.... err, I mean new season of League of Legends where tanks burst more than assassins and adc is literally the most worthless role because you die before you get to do anything.
Right? Like everyone can literally just go tank and still rekt late game
especially since last whisper is terrible now
If you can't beat em,join em?
